tool_description:
A super-fast API to collect football players all available data. Powered by sofifa.com
Get the player's height, weight, birth, value, club details, specialties, and many more!!
name: Sofifa FootBall Player API
title: Sofifa FootBall Player API

api_list.name: /get_html
Get info- Each Player
api_list.description: This gives you information about each players. Like age, height, current club, potential, wage, value, etc

api_list.name: search team players
api_list.description:
get all the players from a team using sofifa url:
https://sofifa.com/team/1/arsenal

api_list.name: Find Players by Names
api_list.description:
Find any players sofifa URL from this endpoint. you can search by partial name.
Then use the output sofifa url to scrape the player information.
